column1: Smoque BBQ////Let's be honest for a minute
column2: you don't care what I ordered
column3: and I won't waste your time by telling you.  Let me just say that everything
column7: and side is worth your order.  Come early
column9: and come in relaxed fitting pants.  It's BYOB so you can even wash it all down with your favorite beer.  What more can you ask for in a neighborhood restaurant?  Maybe a fitness center next door?  I wouldn't go mind you
column10: but the option would be nice.
